title: Conduct Management Safety Walkthrough
description: A plant manager conducts a safety walkthrough, speaking with operators and looking for potential hazards to reinforce the site's safety culture.

tasks.description: Open the 'Safety Walkthrough' form on a tablet, which includes conversation prompts and observation categories.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct digital form for the walkthrough is loaded.

tasks.description: During the walkthrough, log observations, both positive (e.g., good housekeeping) and negative (e.g., a small, contained oil leak).
tasks.expected_outcome: Several observations are logged in the system.

tasks.description: For the oil leak, create an immediate work order for maintenance to clean it up and repair the source.
tasks.expected_outcome: A high-priority work order is created and dispatched to the maintenance team.
